body_html:
For what it is worth, I think I'm observing the same problem with our models. The bug seems to be present in both tensorflow 1.2.1 and 1.3.0, no matter how TF was compiled - I have tested with a couple of variants. CUDA 8, CuDNN 6 and 1080Ti.

If useful I can upload a frozen version of one of these models.

body:
For what it is worth, I think I'm observing the same problem with our models. The bug seems to be present in both tensorflow 1.2.1 and 1.3.0, no matter how TF was compiled - I have tested with a couple of variants. CUDA 8, CuDNN 6 and 1080Ti.

If useful I can upload a frozen version of one of these models.
